attributes.action: instruct water companies to return to charging churches as charities rather than as business premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Changes in water charging structures in a number of regions mean that churches are charged on the same scale as businesses, leading to large (for example, 1300%) increases in annual water bills.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "instruct water companies to return to charging churches as charities rather than as business premises."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19160
